title: Empires & Dungeons 2: The Sultanate (Premium Edition) 1.1c
description:
This is: Empires & Dungeons 2 - The Sultanate (Premium Edition) 1.1c

Yeah, this one's kinda a verrry updated version of the original game. Lotta strategy, role-playing, castle-building, dungeon-ing, etc. going on with this game. Check it if you like that kinda fun.
--------------------------------------


Description:
In the mystical Eastern deserts, a struggle for power is taking place. Sultans battle for the crown, raising mighty armies in their quest for supremacy. One of these great leaders must succeed. Could it be you?

A unique blend of turn based strategy and real-time roleplaying, Empires & Dungeons 2 is a highly addictive game from the makers of the Smugglers series. You have to build a mighty castle, hire an army and conquer the towns and defences of your enemies. As well as gathering resources, you'll be exploring monster-infested dungeons in search of wealth, honour and experience.

Key Features:
-New oriental setting. Ride into battle with mighty war elephants!
-A bigger strategy map (12Ãƒâ€”11 fields)
-New desert maps
-New scenarios & the best ones from Empires & Dungeons 1
-New artwork (desert heros, castle, village, etc.)
-Partly a screen re-design for easier accessibility
-New oriental soundtrack and complete new SFX
-Items now display their total ability strengths making it easier to compare them
-Complete re-balanced monster and army units strengths, e.g. archers cause more damage and cavalry (which are elephants now) cause more damage to archers and cannons (former catapults).
-Game balance tweaked, e.g. you now get more money in dungeons to make dungeon -crawling more worthwhile in the late phase of the game.
-A couple of new monsters to fit the desert setting (among all the cool monsters known from Empires & Dungeons 1)
-Some monsters now have special weaknesses and invulnerabilities to certain attacks, e.g. donÃ‚Â´t try to stab a skeleton.
-Game editors now included in the game package and modified to fit the new setting
-New equipment system = Decide which weapon to use in combat

WhatÃ‚Â´s included in the "Premium" edition?
--Game editors now included in the game package and modified to fit the new setting
--2 additional scenarios

Minimum Requirements:
Windows 7 / Vista / XP
1 GHz Processor
512 MB Available System Memory
250 MB Available Hard Drive Space
